About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

My name is Hoang, but english-speaking people call me Bill. My origin lies in Hanoi, Vietnam. Both of my parents are Vietnamese, but in 1994 they decided to move to Russia (that is also the year when my older sister was born). Six years later in a Moscow hospital I was brought to life and started my adventurous life journey. Growing up I was taught Vietnamese by my parents and Russian ny growing up in the country. Then I started learning English in school as it was the requirement. As a result, I am a junior at Worcester Polytechnic Institute in the United States where I started pursuing Computer Science major.

Moscow State School #978

Assistent System Administrator

My high school had a position for an assistent system administrator, so I applied and got to help my school with various technological problems.

YouTube Channel

Video Editer

One year after high school graduation my friend and I were talking about how difficult for us was to apply for colleges and how much stress it brought us. Then, we created a YouTube channel to help other students with a huge struggle of what to do after high school. In this project I am the main video editer and a design creater.

Self improvement

Full stack developer

As I am studing computer science in college I grow interested in different areas of computer science. As a result, I started a few project that are related to programming. Right now my main project is an mobile application.
